name: It's Fake
description:
Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1

This game is a platformer, but there's one catch: things can sometimes be fake.

You have to play each level and die a lot of times to find out what's fake and how to win each level. Try to complete the game with as less deaths as possible.

Note: One requirement for winning a level is not falling.

Controls

Arrow Keys or A/D to move

Space to Jump

Features

Enemies - Jump on them to kill them get 1000 points

Coins - Collect them to get 500 points

What does "Fake" mean?

Fake ground - Ground with no collision. You can go through them.

Fake enemies - Don't touch them whatsoever

Fake coins - Same as fake enemies

Credits

PixelMush for the font (Tripfive)
